Content: fiat prices are mostly stable but during a storm it is natural for some things to get out of alignment for a bit

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: when the bull stampedes, everything gets out of its way

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: normal process

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: the good news is that this is pulling in fiat into the crypto space

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: when the dominance comes back down, by DEFINITION, it will mean that on average the alts are gaining in BTC price

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: the peak of altcoin price in fiat will be AFTER BTC has peaked in the bull cycle

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: we are only 6 months from bear market low

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: if this is too stress, turn off the charts. nothing can be done, nothing at all, during BTC dominance surges

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: alt season is likely 6 months or more away

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: the good news is that the longer it takes for BTC to peak, the more money has flowed into crypto

Content: of course if you are day trading, then on any given day some random coin out of the 10000+ will be making big gains. good luck finding, buying and selling 100% precisely. if anybody can predict this consistently, they can make 1000x per year gains
